ThingDef.label: ursine genome genetrainer
ThingDef.description: Directly injects ursine genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives a series of health states related to bear resilience.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.

ThingDef.label: boom genome genetrainer
ThingDef.description: Directly injects boom genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the ability to produce chemfuel like a boomalope.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
